016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser;
017
018import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.KnownFunctionalGroups;
019import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidAdduct;
020import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.StringFunctions;
021
022/**
023 * Parser implementation for the HMDB lipid shorthand nomenclature.
024 *
025 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
026 * @author Nils Hoffmann
027 */
028public class HmdbParser extends Parser<LipidAdduct> {
029
030    private static final String DEFAULT_GRAMMAR = "HMDB.g4";
031
032    private final KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups;
033
034    /**
035     * Create a new instance of a {@link HmdbParser}.
036     *
037     * @param knownFunctionalGroups the known functional groups
038     * @param grammarContent the grammar text content
039     * @param quote the quotation character used in the grammar
040     */
041    public HmdbParser(KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups, String grammarContent, char quote) {
042        super(grammarContent, quote);
043        this.knownFunctionalGroups = knownFunctionalGroups;
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * Create a new instance of a {@link HmdbParser} with default grammar
048     * {@link HmdbParser#DEFAULT_GRAMMAR} and default quote
049     * {@link StringFunctions#DEFAULT_QUOTE}.
050     *
051     * @param knownFunctionalGroups the known functional groups
052     */
053    public HmdbParser(KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
054        this(knownFunctionalGroups, StringFunctions.getResourceAsString(DEFAULT_GRAMMAR), StringFunctions.DEFAULT_QUOTE);
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Create a new instance of a {@link HmdbParser} with default grammar
059     * {@link HmdbParser#DEFAULT_GRAMMAR} and default quote
060     * {@link StringFunctions#DEFAULT_QUOTE} and default
061     * {@link KnownFunctionalGroups}.
062     */
063    public HmdbParser() {
064        this(new KnownFunctionalGroups(), StringFunctions.getResourceAsString(DEFAULT_GRAMMAR), StringFunctions.DEFAULT_QUOTE);
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public HmdbParserEventHandler newEventHandler() {
069        return new HmdbParserEventHandler(knownFunctionalGroups);
070    }
071
072}
